item.title: Alexa Skill Demo (Week 3)
item.description: This is part of a the Alexa Skill Demo series for Normal Community High School State Farm STEM Program. To view the steps from last session click here. Alexa Skill Slots Link to heading Intents can optionally have arguments called slots. Slot values are extracted from utterances and sent with the intent request. Each slot has a Variable Name (The slot name as it will appear in the intent request to your skill) and a Slot Type (Defines how data in the slot is recognized and handled).
